{"id":887372668,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1674983662,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/887372668/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean validPalindrome(String s) {\n        int i=0, j = s.length()-1;\n\n        boolean isAvailable = true;\n        \n        //  abbad\n        //  ad\n\n        while(i < j){\n\n            if( s.charAt(i) != s.charAt(j) ){\n                if(isAvailable) {\n                    isAvailable = false;\n\n                    if(i == j-1) return true;\n\n                    if( s.charAt(i+1) == s.charAt(j)){\n                        i++;\n                    }\n                    else if( s.charAt(i) == s.charAt(j-1) ){\n                        j--;\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        return false;\n                    }\n\n                }\n                else{\n                    return false;\n                }\n\n\n            }\n            else{\n                i++;\n                j--;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return !(i<j);\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false}
